Translations.Text: Mukashi no mono ga dai ikioiruga
kōsei no mono mo ōi
Hidarite no nakama, kare-ra wa nanidearou
(Kare-ra wa) yake kogasu yōna kaze to, nietatsu yu no naka
kokuen no kage ni
suzushiku mo naku, sawayakade mo nai (-chū ni iru)
Kare-ra wa sore izen, yūfukude (kyōraku ni fukeri)
Taizai o aete okashite ita
Soshite itsumo itte ita. `Watashi-tachi wa shinde kara, tsuchi to hone ni nari, hontōni yomigae sa reru nodeshou ka
Watashi-tachi no furui sosen mo (yomigae sa reru no)desu ka
Itte yaru ga ī. `Sōdatomo, mukashi no mono mo kōsei no mono mo
Kanarazu issho ni shōshū sa reru nodearu. Sadame rareta hi no, sadame rareta toki ni
Sonotoki anata gata wa (dōdearou), mayotte (shinri o) kyogidearu to shita mono yo
Kanarazu anata gata wa zakkūmu no ki (no mi) o tabe
sorede hara wa ippai
Sono Ue nietatsu yu o nomu
nodo ga kawaita rakuda ga nomu yō ni
Korega-shinki no hi no, kare-ra no motenashidearu
Ware wa anata gata o tsukutta. Anata gata wa dōshite shinjitsu o shinjiyou to shinai no ka
Anata gata wa, anata gata no shashutsu suru mono (seieki) ni tsuite kangaeta ka
Sore o tsukutta no wa anata gatana no ka, soretomo ware ga sono sōzō-shadearu no ka
Ware wa, anata gata ni shi (ki) o sadameta. Ware wa,(kesshite) dashinuka re tari suru koto wanai
Daga ware wa dōrui no mono de torikae (sedai no kōtai), matawa anata gataga shiranai (hoka no keitai no) mono ni, anata gata o Sō (ri kae)ru
Anata gata wa, tashikani saisho no sōzō o shitte iru. Soredemo naze ryūi shinai no ka
Anata gata wa, anata gata ga tagayasu (hata no) koto o kangaeta ka
Anata gataga sore (shokubutsu) o sodateru no ka, soretomo ware ga sodateru no ka
Moshi ware ga hossurunaraba, sore o kareta kuzu ni shite shimau. Anata gata wa kyōgaku shite yamanai
(Soshite iudearou. ) `Watashi-tachi wa hontōni fusai o kase rareta
Iya, watashi-tachi wa (rōdō no seika o) toriage rareta
Mata anata gata no nomu mizu ni tsuite kangaeta ka
Anata gataga kumo kara (ame o) furaseru no ka, soretomo ware ga furaseru no ka
Ware ga moshi hossurunaraba, sore o shiokaraku suru koto ga dekiru. Anata gata wa dōshite kansha shinai no ka
Anata gata wa, tomoshibi ni tsuite kangaeta ka
Sono (moyasu) ki o, anata gata ga tsukutta no ka, soretomo ware ga tsukutta no ka
Ware wa sore o kyōkun to shi, mata kōya no jūmin no benri no tame ni tsukutta
Dakara idaide ara reru anata no omo no gyomei o tatae nasai
